EmailTemplate.description: Email template used when a business doc exception record has been marked invalid.
EmailTemplate.name: Business Doc Exception Invalid
EmailTemplate.subject: Document Submission was reviewed - Further action is required
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!Exception__c.Related_Account_Name__c},
Thank you for submitting your {!Exception__c.RecordType}. It has been reviewed and determined to be an invalid document.
See the following for details: {!Exception__c.Document_Notes__c}
Please log in to your ACV Auctions App and submit your dealership document. If you have any questions or concerns please email us at {!Exception__c.Reply_To_Email__c} or contact your account manager for further assistance.
Thank you for being a valued ACV dealer partner!
640 Ellicott St #321 Buffalo, NY 14203 www.acvauctions.com
Want to change how you receive these emails? You can update your preferences or unsubscribe.
Copyright Â© 2018 ACV Auctions, All rights reserved.
